name: mikroe.click.ecg3
short_description: ECG 3 click is a complete solution for ECG and HR application development, utilizing a specialized IC with a clinical-grade analog front-end (AFE). ECG 3 click uses the MAX30003 IC, an ultra-low power, single-channel bio-sensor, which features a wide range of different options, making it an ideal solution for development of heart rate and ECG monitoring applications, fitness applications, for the ECG bio-authentication, and similar applications related to heart monitoring. ECG 3 click is also equipped with the 3.5mm electrodes connector, making it ready to be used out of the box.
